scripts.build:appimage: npm run copy-native && tsc && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder-appimage.config.cjs --linux
scripts.build:win: npm run copy-native && tsc && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.cjs --win
scripts.build:mac: npm run copy-native && tsc && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.cjs --mac
